content: the most basic hat benefits from the best yarns lang kris is a merino double-chainette with a touch of elastic resulting in a squish and stretchy fabric perfect for a warm hat yarn lang kris 2 skeins shown in blue 08 and tan 03 3 skeins will make 2 hats needles us#10 & #10 5 circular or double points your choice gauge 4 sts/in and 7 5 row/in on #10 5 in stockinette stitch in the round finished measurements adult small 16 circ x 10 high large 17 circ x 11 high
